description: AI-powered health diagnosis platform using Perplexity Sonar

agents.name: frontend-dev
agents.goal: Build the UI using Next.js, TailwindCSS, and shadcn/ui

agents.name: backend-dev
agents.goal: Connect Perplexity Sonar API and Supabase for auth and data

agents.name: designer
agents.goal: Ensure a clean, dark-themed medical interface

agents.name: docs-agent
agents.goal: Generate README, usage instructions, and setup guides

agents.name: test-agent
agents.goal: Write unit tests and ensure accessibility & mobile responsiveness
